languages.text: "Скажи, Соломон, ты никогда не колебался, вынося приговор? Никогда не просыпался среди ночи, пытаясь понять, насколько ты был безупречен в своих суждениях?"
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"
languages.original_text: "Скажи, Соломон, ты никогда не колебался, вынося приговор? Никогда не просыпался среди ночи, пытаясь понять, насколько ты был безупречен в своих суждениях?"

traits.locale_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never wavered while passing sentence? Have you never woken up at night, wondering if you have been flawless in your judgement?"
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"
"Did every person you executed deserve their sentence? Have you never been moved by someone's contrition? I cannot believe you sleep well, Solomorne."
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never wavered while passing sentence? Have you never woken up at night, wondering if you have been flawless in your judgement?"
"Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

languages.text: 「教えてくれ、ソロモーン。あなたはこれまで、一度たりとも判決を下すときにためらったことはないのか？夜中に目を覚まし、自分の裁きが本当に完璧だったのかと疑ったことは、ただの一度もないか？」
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: 「教えてくれ、ソロモーン。あなたはこれまで、一度たりとも判決を下すときにためらったことはないのか？夜中に目を覚まし、自分の裁きが本当に完璧だったのかと疑ったことは、ただの一度もないか？」

languages.text: "Sagt mir, Solomorne, habt Ihr kein einziges Mal gezögert, wenn Ihr ein Urteil verkündet habt? Lagt Ihr niemals nachts wach in dem Zweifel, ob Euer Urteil wirklich fehlerlos war?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: "Sagt mir, Solomorne, habt Ihr kein einziges Mal gezögert, wenn Ihr ein Urteil verkündet habt? Lagt Ihr niemals nachts wach in dem Zweifel, ob Euer Urteil wirklich fehlerlos war?"

languages.text: « Dites-moi, Solomorne, avez-vous déjà eu la moindre hésitation avant de prononcer une sentence ? Ne vous êtes-vous jamais réveillé la nuit, à vous demander si votre jugement avait vraiment été irréprochable ? »
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, Solomorne, avez-vous déjà eu la moindre hésitation avant de prononcer une sentence ? Ne vous êtes-vous jamais réveillé la nuit, à vous demander si votre jugement avait vraiment été irréprochable ? »

languages.text: «Dígame, Solomorne, ¿ha dudado alguna vez a la hora de dictar sentencia? ¿Se ha despertado alguna vez en mitad de la noche, preguntándose si su juicio ha sido verdaderamente impecable?».
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: «Dígame, Solomorne, ¿ha dudado alguna vez a la hora de dictar sentencia? ¿Se ha despertado alguna vez en mitad de la noche, preguntándose si su juicio ha sido verdaderamente impecable?».

languages.text: “告诉我，索罗蒙，你在宣读判决的时候从来没犹豫过吗？你有没有在夜深人静的时候醒来过，怀疑自己曾经的审判是否真的毫无疏漏？”
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: “告诉我，索罗蒙，你在宣读判决的时候从来没犹豫过吗？你有没有在夜深人静的时候醒来过，怀疑自己曾经的审判是否真的毫无疏漏？”

languages.text: "Söyle bana Solomorne, bir hükmün infazı sırasında bir kez olsun tereddüt etmedin mi? Verdiğin kararın kusursuzluğuna dair hiç şüpheye düşmedin mi? İçini kemiren bu şüphe yüzünden uykusuz kaldığın geceler olmadı mı hiç?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"

traits.locale_text: "Söyle bana Solomorne, bir hükmün infazı sırasında bir kez olsun tereddüt etmedin mi? Verdiğin kararın kusursuzluğuna dair hiç şüpheye düşmedin mi? İçini kemiren bu şüphe yüzünden uykusuz kaldığın geceler olmadı mı hiç?"

languages.original_text: "Tell me, Solomorne, have you never once hesitated while passing sentence? Have you never awoken at night, wondering if you have been truly impeccable in your judgement?"
